#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std ;
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,t,p,n;
    cin >> t ;
    long long int a,b,c;

    while(t--) {
        cin >> a ;
        cin >> b ;
        c = ((a*b) - a - b);
        cout << c << endl ;
    }
    return 0;
}
